Thank you for all you do! Happy Administrative Professionals Day Tracy and Monique! #SMSTeamAwesome #SpoonerProud
A HUGE thank you goes out to Jessie and Dawn for all they do for our school every day! Happy Administrative Professionals Day!
Congratulations to Jeffrey Rongner (tenor) and Alex Snarski (bass), who were accepted into the Mixed Choir for the 2020 WSMA State Honors Project. They will join top choral students throughout the...

The weather is starting to get nice! Go outside with your family for some fresh air and get creative! Share your chalk art or window art with us! #SpoonerProud Email your teacher or...
SES would like to share some Rails Way spirit with our families this week as we begin our new learning adventure. Remember to work hard and be a Rails Way Leader! Good luck!
Spooner High School Staff have a message they would like to share with all of their students. #SpoonerProud

SES teachers have a special message for all their students. Watch the video to see it up close:
#SpoonerProud #weloveyou #wemissyou #webelieveinyou
Thank you to Burnett Dairy for your donation of cheese for our school meals! Also, thank you to Bruce Chell Trucking of Siren for volunteering to deliver the cheese!
